RE: License #: CB530246146
Staircase Youth Services
920 E Tinkham Ave
Ludington, MI 49431
Dear Ms. Arneson:
Your Child Placing Agency license is renewed. It is valid only at your present address
and is nontransferable. If you move, please notify us at least 30 days in advance.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact Courtney Atkins, Area Manager, at 517-599-3667.
Sincerely,
Doug Turrill, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
Suite 11
701 S. Elmwood
Traverse City, MI 49684
(231) 383-5531
enclosure
P.O. BOX 30650  LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
2.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also a MISEP violation. Please note that there
are additional MISEP requirements that may not be included in section 1. The
facility is in compliance will all additional MISEP requirements except for the
following:
3.) The agency is non-contracted.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
Technical assistance was not offered at this time.
V. CONSULTATION
Consultation was not offered at this time.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this
licensing period.
There were no incidents of substantiated child abuse and/or neglect during
this licensing period.
There were no incidents of substantiated corporal punishment during this
licensing period.
The agency has submitted 0 acceptable corrective action plans not related to
maltreatment during this licensing period.
4

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and/or MISEP requirements. It is recommended that the facility be
issued a renewal of their regular license.
